creator: glennop@operamail.com
text:
This would be used with repeated execution of available and antcall tasks where the target uses 
the if or unless attribute.  Because once the property is set, it is always set (i assume, please let 
me know if this is not so) this limits the usefulness of ant.

What I would like to do is something 
like the following
<available to set a property
<antcall a target that checks the 
property
<unset the property
<available to the same property for a different 
file
<antcall a target 
...

Properties are immutable by design.  Allowing properties to be unset breaks many
concepts in the current version of Ant.  Setting properties only within an
<antcall> may be what you're after, as their value is only for the single call.
